title: Why when I close one eye the vision in the open eye goes black? - Quora

response.answer_text: Maybe you can't see with the other eye. If this is a longstanding condition you might not notice it until you close the good eye, as your brain will have adapted to the absence of an image from the other eye. See an ophthalmologist, anyway.
Sounds like you’re blind in the other eye. You should have that checked out by a medical professional immediately.
